question: [File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/indexer/transaction_processor.rs] [Function: apply_processor_status()] [Empty status array] Can psms be an empty array at line 146, causing get_chunks() to return invalid ranges or the loop at lines 149-164 to execute incorrectly? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/indexer/transaction_processor.rs] [Function: process_transactions_with_status()] [Large batch DoS] Can processing extremely large transaction batches cause memory exhaustion or excessive database writes, degrading overall indexer performance? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/indexer/transaction_processor.rs] [Function: mark_versions_started()] [Status flood DoS] Can repeatedly calling this function with large version ranges flood the processor_statuses table with millions of records, causing database performance degradation? (High)
